summary: Contains a suite of unit and integration tests that verify the provider‑budget limiting functionality of the Litellm routing system. The tests cover configuration retrieval, spend accounting, budget window resets, metric emission, Redis synchronization, and error handling when budgets are exceeded.
business_intent: Ensure that the routing layer can enforce per‑provider cost caps, accurately track and reset spending periods, and integrate with caching and monitoring tools, thereby helping users control LLM expenses.
